itemInfo.itemDesc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing. Topaz Ore requires a certain level of skill to collect.\n- How to Obtain: It can be directly obtained from rock containing Gemstones.

item.name: Topaz Necklace
item.desc: A necklace decorated with a Topaz.

item.name: Topaz Ring
item.desc: A ring decorated with a Topaz.

item.name: Topaz Earrings
item.desc: An earring decorated with a Topaz.

item.name: Resplendent Topaz
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Grinding a Rough Topaz. It requires the knowledge of Grinding: Beginner.

※ Find Ornella in Heidel and complete the Materials for Equipment Repair Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Topaz
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Grinding Rough Topaz.
